Use this page to create test checkout data in your sandbox account

Email warning:

When testing, be aware that any subsciption you set up that unless cancelled you will get email receipts for and renewal emails for.

I suggest using a test email that will go nowhere such as myName.test@paddle.com



Please have the following values handy:

  1. Your seller ID: a 5 digit number that corresponds to your sandbox account that you can find under Developer Tools â†’ Authentication
  2. Any priceIDs you'd like to pass to the checkout, these are created for each product
  3. Any corresponding quantities for each priceID, please make sure that this quantity corresponds to any quantity limits you set on its respective priceID
